Recipe Box

26 Oct 2014

This is my Angular + Rails sandbox! The app is simple:

  • Stores recipe cards
  • Sorts recipes by category
  • Shows individual recipes in detail

Wiring up Angular with Rails was stupidly easy. It felt weird plugging black boxes into my templates everywhere, but the boxes seem to work really wellâ€¦ And this would have taken me hours more to build in Backbone, so mixed feelings on all that. And the color scheme is just something I wanted to try. Blues and reds.
